data.text:
Owner/Organization/Other Name

Search tips:

Owner names are entered as they appear on the deed or other legal document presented for transfer. For example, if the deed reads JOSEPH JONES and you search for JOE JONES you may not find the property you are searching.

For individual names, enter the last name followed by the first name(for example, JONES JO)

Partial entries are accepted and search results will be returned for all partial matches of the entered search results. A specific property can be selected from the search results.

House # Range -

Exact/Low High Range

Street Name

Search Tips:

Type street name only in "street name" field (without ST, DR, CT suffix)

For exact search, enter a property address number in the Exact/Low Range and leave the High Range empty. Enter Street Name (without suffix) and click Search.

For a range of property on a street, enter Low Range and High Range. Enter Street Name (without suffix) and click Search.

Putting a property address number in the Exact/Low Range field with no Street Name and clicking Search will give you results of all properties with that address number for all streets.

To check spelling of a street in our system click the street listing - Street Listings

Parcel Number

Search tips:

The Parcel Number is a numeric or alphanumeric string of characters that uniquely identifies a property record. In Hamilton County most parcel numbers are 13 characters long. Your parcel number can be found on your tax bill or most other correspondence mailed to you from the Auditor's office.

To Search by Parcel Number, all or part of the number can be entered. Search Results will be returned for all partial matches of the entered number. A specific property can be selected from the search results.

To search for a specific Parcel Number, enter all 13 characters.

Fill in as much or as little criteria as desired. The more criteria you provide, the more specific results you will receive. Press Clear Form or Start New Search to clear all criteria and start over.

Book - Page -

Owner/Organization/Other Name

For individuals, enter last name followed by first name (for example, Doe John) Incomplete or partial entries are ok (for example, Doe J) Uppercase or lowercase allowed (Doe J is the same as DOE J)
